# TwicPics Documentation

## Basics
- [Errors handling](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/basics/errors-handling.md)
- [Limits and restrictions](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/basics/limits-and-restrictions.md)
- [Supported formats](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/basics/supported-formats.md)

## Components
- [Angular](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/angular.md): Use TwicPics Angular components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [Flutter](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/flutter.md): Use TwicPics Flutter Widget to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [Gatsby](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/gatsby.md): Use TwicPics Gatsby components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [Next](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/next.md): Use TwicPics Next.js Components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [Nuxt 2](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/nuxt-2.md): Use TwicPics Nuxt 2 Components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [Nuxt 3](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/nuxt-3.md): Use TwicPics Nuxt 3 Components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [React Native](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/react-native.md): Use TwicPics React Native Components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [React](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/react.md): Use TwicPics React Components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [Svelte 3](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/svelte-3.md): Use TwicPics Svelte Components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [Svelte 4](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/svelte-4.md): Use TwicPics Svelte Components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [Svelte 5](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/svelte-5.md): Use TwicPics Svelte Components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [SvelteKit](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/sveltekit.md): Use TwicPics SvelteKit Components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [Vue 2](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/vue-2.md): Use TwicPics Vue 2 Components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [Vue 3](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/vue-3.md): Use TwicPics Vue 3 Components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.
- [Web Components](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/components/webcomponents.md): Use TwicPics Web Components to get images and videos integration best practices out-of-the-box.

## Essentials
- [TwicPics API](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/essentials/api.md): Learn to write requests to the TwicPics media transformation API.
- [TwicPics Components](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/essentials/components.md): TwicPics components bring image & videos best-practices out-of-the-box to your favorite framework.
- [Domain Configuration](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/essentials/domain-configuration.md): Learn how to setup domains using the TwicPics dashboard.
- [TwicPics Native](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/essentials/native.md): Learn how to use TwicPics Native to benefit from context-aware media optimization in your web pages.
- [Path Configuration](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/essentials/path-configuration.md): Learn how to configure your domain paths to tweak, control, and protect how your medias are delivered.

## Getting-started
- [Integration](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/getting-started/integration.md)
- [Setup](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/getting-started/setup.md)
- [Why TwicPics?](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/getting-started/why-twicpics.md)

## Guides
- [TwicPics Native Examples and Use Cases](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/guides/examples-and-use-cases.md): We have compiled a number of examples and use cases to get you started with TwicPics Native.
- [Handling LCP Videos](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/guides/handling-lcp-videos.md): Learn how to handle the Largest Contentful Paint for your hero videos with TwicPics.
- [Image Best Practices](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/guides/image-best-practices.md): Learn to implement image best practices for critical images, lazy loading, and low quality image placeholder.
- [Local development](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/guides/local-development.md): Learn to use TwicPics in local with ngrok.
- [Multiple Environments](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/guides/multiple-environments.md): Users on the Business tier or higher can create multiple workspaces, allowing to have multiple domains.
- [TwicPics Native Quick Start Guide](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/guides/native-quick-start-guide.md): Learn to integrate TwicPics Native images and videos optimization API in your web page.
- [Testing Placeholders](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/guides/testing-placeholders.md): Learn to use TwicPics placeholders API to test your medias integration.
- [Video Optimization](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/guides/video-optimization.md): Learn to implement video optimization best practices.

## Integrations
- [Akeneo](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/integrations/akeneo.md): Deliver perfectly optimized images from your Akeneo PIM to your websites and apps in a blink of an eye.
- [WordPress](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/integrations/wordpress-plugin.md): Integrate lazy-loaded, pixel-perfect, highly optimized images to the most popular CMS in the world.

## Reference
- [Color chaining](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/reference/color-chaining.md): How color-related transformations, overlays and masks interact.
- [TwicPics Native Attributes](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/reference/native-attributes.md): The complete reference of the attributes recognized by TwicPics Native.
- [API Parameters](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/reference/parameters.md): The complete reference of transformation parameters recognized by the TwicPics API.
- [Placeholders API](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/reference/placeholders.md): The complete reference for the TwicPics placeholders API.
- [API Transformations](https://www.twicpics.com/docs/reference/transformations.md): The complete reference of media transformations supported by the TwicPics API.
